mean_cn: v. 加固，加强，增援，支持
mean_en: to strengthen (something, such as clothing or a building) by adding more material for support
word_etyma: re再次+in加强+force强大，力量→再次增加力量 → 加强，巩固
short_phrase: reinforce the structure of the building
sentence: We reinforced the structure of the building with steel rods.
sentence_trans: 我们用钢筋来加固这栋建筑的结构。
